title: Ollama — AI Tool Review
description: Ollama lets you run powerful open-source AI models (Llama, Mistral, DeepSeek) locally on your computer with a simple command. Ollama is an open-source tool that makes running large language models locally on your computer as easy as running a single command. It supports Llama 3, Mistral, DeepSeek, Phi, Gemma, and dozens of other models, providing a local API that works with most AI applications. It's the easiest way to run private, free AI locally. Highlights: One-command model installation. Completely private — no data leaves your machine. Free to use. Wide model support. Local API compatible with OpenAI API.
